verses.text: \w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Assuerus, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w India|strong="H1912"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w* \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* twenty-seven \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*:

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w sat|strong="H7675"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* city Susan \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* capital \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.

Now \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3605"\w* great \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* most mighty \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Persians, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nobles|strong="H6579"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w governors|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* might shew \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* boasting \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* power, \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w to|strong="H3117"\w* wit, \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* fourscore \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* \w expired|strong="H4390"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* invited \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Susan, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* least: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* commanded \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wood, \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* planted \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* care \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* there \w were|strong="H5921"\w* hung \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* every side sky coloured, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* green, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w violet|strong="H8504"\w* hangings, \w fastened|strong="H0270"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* silk, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, which \w were|strong="H5921"\w* put \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w rings|strong="H1550"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* ivory, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w held|strong="H0270"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* marble \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w beds|strong="H4296"\w* also \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, placed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* order \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* floor paved \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w porphyry|strong="H0923"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w white|strong="H2353"\w* marble: which \w was|strong="H5982"\w* embellished \w with|strong="H5921"\w* painting \w of|strong="H5921"\w* wonderful variety.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* invited, drank \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* cups, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* meats \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* divers \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w one|strong="H4428"\w* after another. \w Wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* abundance \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* best \w was|strong="H4428"\w* presented, \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* worthy \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H8248"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* magnificence.

\w Neither|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* compel \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* drink \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* willing, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H0369"\w* \w appointed|strong="H3245"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w set|strong="H3245"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* table \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* nobles, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* might \w take|strong="H3245"\w* \w what|strong="H7522"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w Also|strong="H1571"\w* Vasthi \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w used|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* dwell.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* merry, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* very much drinking \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* warmed \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* Mauman, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Bazatha, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Harbona|strong="H2726"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Bagatha, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Abgatha, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zethar|strong="H2242"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Charcas, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w served|strong="H8334"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w To|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* Vasthi \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w crown|strong="H3804"\w* \w set|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w head|strong="H8269"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* shew \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* exceeding \w beautiful|strong="H3308"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* signified \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*. Whereupon \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, being \w angry|strong="H7107"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* inflamed \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*,

Baked \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* according \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w custom|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w always|strong="H6256"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w person|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w laws|strong="H1881"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* judgments \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* forefathers:

(Now \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w nearest|strong="H7138"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w were|strong="H8269"\w*, Charsena, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Sethar, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Admatha|strong="H0133"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Tharsis, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Mares, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Marsana, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Mamuchan, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Persians, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*, \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H8269"\w* used \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*:)

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* sentence ought \w to|strong="H5921"\w* pass \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Vasthi \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w obey|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* commandment \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Mamuchan \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hearing \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*: \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Vasthi hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w only|strong="H0905"\w* injured \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w deed|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* abroad \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w despise|strong="H0959"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w husbands|strong="H1167"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* Vasthi \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* example \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wives \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Persians \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* slight \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* husbands: wherefore \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* indignation \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w please|strong="H2895"\w* thee, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w edict|strong="H1697"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w law|strong="H1881"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Persians \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w must|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* altered, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* Vasthi \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* queen \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* published \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* provinces \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w empire|strong="H4438"\w*, (\w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w very|strong="H5704"\w* wide,) \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w well|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w lesser|strong="H6996"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* honour \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w husbands|strong="H1167"\w*.

\w His|strong="H4428"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Mamuchan.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w* \w could|strong="H0376"\w* \w hear|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w read|strong="H5612"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* divers \w languages|strong="H3956"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* characters, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w husbands|strong="H0376"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* rulers \w and|strong="H4428"\w* masters \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H3605"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* published \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
